pullRequest.title: Introduce custom count down latch for UI Automation Tests
pullRequest.bodyText: This count down latch has a custom await method that accepts an enum type of wait duration (instead of specifying time and unit directly). Also this await method will fail the test if the await actually times out.

commit.message: Introduce custom count down latch for UI Automation Tests

nodes.bodyText: Can we contain rather than extend here?

+package com.microsoft.identity.client.ui.automation;
+
+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+
+import org.junit.Assert;
+
+import java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch;
+import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
+
+/**
+ * A custom {@link CountDownLatch} to be used during UI Automation Token Requests.
+ */
+public class TokenRequestLatch extends CountDownLatch {
